[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fgv/ts-res-ui-components](./ts-res-ui-components.md) &gt; [ResourceEditorProps](./ts-res-ui-components.resourceeditorprops.md)

## ResourceEditorProps interface

Props that will be passed to custom resource editors created by ResourceEditorFactory. Custom editors should implement this interface to be compatible with ResolutionView.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ResourceEditorProps 
```
